tweets.text: I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW

@NigelSarbutts @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding You understood that, I understood that, especially with Keir involvement. What is it about 2021 breeding season that so many are out to prevent and destroy it? Beggars belief.

RSPB England statement on works during nesting season on the Lower Otter Estuary in East Devon ... 

@ChrisGPackham @WiseBirding @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon https://t.co/cUVmoVTYn2

@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe There was drone footage last weekend of the site removing large amounts of plasterboard from the landfill that had recently been tipped ahead of the @EnvAgency visit so this one is a certainty. The inspection process should never allow this to happen...  @DefraGovUK @WHO

So my #tuesdayvibe is yet again waking up after been poisoned in the night by landfill gas headache sore throat dry itchy eyes @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk this has to end would you live like this? #StopTheStink #CapItOff #AirPollution https://t.co/XYKP4YpoVI

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

Thank you @MattHancock for supporting my campaign, and the people of #NewcastleUnderLyme, by writing to the @EnvAgency.

As Matt says, it is imperative that the Environment Agency exercise the full range of their regulatory and enforcement powers over the company. https://t.co/lH1na7Cr8A

tweets.text: @WiseBirding @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife Very well done for being so proactive and caring Chris, most of us want this project but not at the expense of breeding birds and other critters so thank you from them all üëç

@SimonTagg @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA This place needs closing and capping, if it needs to become an orphan site so be it, If you had done your job correctly in the first place then there would be more than ¬£1 million set aside for the restoration phase. That's not our fault, it's yours.

tweets.text: @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Chris Packham was using HS2 as an example and has made a very good case against this development the point is that the environment department who are there to protect the environment against the likes of HS2 are now doing the same/ similar themselves.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I‚Äôll never trust the leadership of @EnvAgency or @NaturalEngland again if this goes ahead. The site is full of birds with nests. You cannot find them all and work round them. Shallow, vacuous leaders at EA and NE. Shameful

Year 6 have had a brilliant workshop from @EnvAgency @BostonBarrierEA to aid our learning. Exploring the floods the local area faced and how to prevent them has been a great way to start our D.T this term - civil engineers here we come! #EducatingChampions @WybertonPrimary https://t.co/EgNv8Duj3V

*NOW* Our #THYMEproject @ResEngland @EEIatHull @GeoTU1 ‚û°Future Soils Workshop‚¨Ö. Exploring optimisation of agricultural soil management for crop health, water quality, reduced runoff & net zero. Awesome programme @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @NFUtweets @SustainableLsps @YorkshireWater https://t.co/6gfa1qckHF

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Would you like to explain to your 461k followers, what an otter project in Devon has to do with HS2? The two are at nearly 200 miles apart and not event connected.  Complete misuse of social media.

@AndreasHeinem @IUCNpeat @YorkEnvironment @SEIresearch @DefraChiefScien @DefraSoils @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @_OliviaBlake @RachaelMaskell @PyroLife_ITN @Nick_Miles_ Congratulations @AndreasHeinem. Fearless.
@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA Without a doubt she was. Total PR exercise

@BattmanMichael @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding It's of no concern where it is It's the fact the law is going to be broken especially during breading season. 
Your point about hs2 not going through Devon just emphasises the fact it's for a tiny part of the population which is a different argument ü§î

@maricaoneill @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe We have a carbon monoxide detector well 2 actually one in kitchen and one in front bedroom where boiler is. Also you don‚Äôt have to use gaffer tape. You could use cardboard although strong enough to block out smell still porous enough to allow some flow. I‚Äôm no expert but still.

tweets.text:
This country is playing a massive part in the destruction of nature
It beggars belief that you are going to sanction this @EnvAgency
This is despicable and totally unacceptable
We are seeing more examples of wanton wildlife crimes by the day and you should be protecting nature https://t.co/zj9SSrlkdN

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I‚Äôve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text:
Panorama programme CSO that apparently never discharged in 2020, this was day 4 of discharge in Feb 2021, managing rivers for wildlife according the the @EnvAgency , @WaterUK say Storm overflows are a small part of the bigger picture to make rivers thrive.
#sewage #pollution https://t.co/jVQXsOsc1Q
The site is littered with tyres going odd google earth and drone footage. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I thought this was illegal? #stopthestink #capitoff. https://t.co/SklFpdYD2f

@mattthecumbrian I admire your optimism but @NaturalEngland and the @EnvAgency no longer seem fit for purpose

Nothing to see here eh @EnvAgencyMids & @RedIndustries2? Just a damning letter describing how the toxic gases from Walley‚Äôs Quarry affect Staffordshire‚Äôs Fire and Rescue Service. I‚Äôd put that on the top of any risk registers you have (if you have any of course). #stopthestink https://t.co/avCr11feZn
@markwilkinson1 How big an area? Report to NE‚Äôs EIA helpline,even if below 2ha - helps them get evidence on attritional losses.

urls.title: Flood & Coast 2021 - Jun 28 | Hopin
urls.description: Get tickets to Flood & Coast 2021, taking place 06/28/2021 to 07/01/2021. Hopin is your source for engaging events and experiences.

tweets.text:
Join us for #Floodandcoast2021 virtual conference & expo from 28 June - 1 July, focused on the most important issues in flood & coastal erosion risk management. 

Register by May 10, 2021 to receive SUPER EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT! @EnvAgency #FCExcellenceAwards
https://t.co/kq543vSWty https://t.co/UBBWZFrdhL

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va
@SimonTagg @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Cap it off and shut it down.
